sentence: pic.twitter.com/kPlUV2FALi CSPAN (@cspan) April 4, 2022 John Oliver to Kevin McCarthy: You 'raised the monster' that is Madison Cawthorn and 'it's your effing problem' Raw Story, Sarah K. Burris, 4/4/2022 Rep. Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) revealed this week that he no longer has "trust" in Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-NC), the young official who outed GOP members for having "sexual get-togethers" and snorting cocaine.
title: DKos Asheville Open Thread: Your weekly Cawthorn, packed full of (your words here). And bears!
